main_definition: to happen or be done immediately, without delay.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Happen very quickly or in an immediate manner.
meanings_and_examples.example: The button clicked instantly and the computer screen turned on.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Understand or grasp a concept immediately, without needing explanation.
meanings_and_examples.example: I instantly understood why she was upset when I saw her crying.

meanings_and_examples.definition: To occur at the same time as another event, without any delay between them.
meanings_and_examples.example: The music started playing instantaneously when we entered the club.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Perform an action or react to something in a very quick manner.
meanings_and_examples.example: She instantly replied to my text message, thanking me for the offer.
